attributes.action: withdraw our entry in the annual political farce that is the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Every year we contribute to the funding of the Eurovision Song Contest - the only benefit of which is that we don't have to "qualify" via a semi-final.  We then have to watch a blatant political exercise of eastern european countries voting for their neighbours or political allies.  This is a total waste of our money and I don't see why our money should be used to fund this farce.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
